name: Financial liability instrument
description:
A Financial liability instrument is an Instrument role where the Instrument acts in the role of a Financial liability (according to the applied accounting standard) where the instrument is intended as a liability. 

Please note that a Financial liability instrument does not necessarily be recognised in the balance sheet.
Please note too that an instrument can be both an Asset and a Liability at the same time. This can happen, for example, when a debtor overpays the fees and/or installments.
